item.title: Mirror
item.dc:creator: Mikel
item.description:
Mirror is a 2D puzzle game built in Perlenspiel, a minimalist web-based game engine.

The post Mirror appeared first on Mikel Matticoli.
item.content:encoded:
Mirror is a 2D puzzle game built in Perlenspiel, a minimalist web-based game engine.

Project Website

Additional details/content coming soon. In the meantime, feel free to see the project website above or check out some of my other projects!

item.title: Buried Voices
item.dc:creator: Mikel
item.description:
Buried voices is a 3D puzzle-platformer game for PC that explores the issues of historical revisionism and cultural erasure through the lens of Khura's journey to discover the truth about her heritage.

The post Buried Voices appeared first on Mikel Matticoli.
item.content:encoded:
Buried voices is a 3D puzzle-platformer game for PC that explores the issues of historical revisionism and cultural erasure through the lens of Khura’s journey to discover the truth about her heritage.

Project Website

Additional details/content coming soon. In the meantime, feel free to see the project website above or check out some of my other projects!

The post Buried Voices appeared first on Mikel Matticoli.
